'''Maiden's Longing''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a default tune in the [[Euphonium Unbound]] furnishings.

==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|Moon in One's Cup|MoonCup|section=1}}
* ''Maiden's Longing'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Keqing]] for this song.
